actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to allow veterans with service-connected disabilities who are eligible for military retired pay for non-regular service to receive compensation for such disabilities from the Veterans' Administration and to receive such retired pay without reduction in either such compensation or such retired pay.

summary.text: Permits certain veterans with service-connected disabilities who are retired members of the uniformed services to receive compensation concurrently with retired pay, without deduction from either.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to allow veterans with service-connected disabilities who are eligible for military retired pay for non-regular service to receive compensation for such disabilities from the Veterans' Administration and to receive such retired pay without reduction in either such compensation or such retired pay.
